EmailTemplate.name: Anonymise User Notification -CH-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Your account has been deleted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Cached_FirstName__c},
Thank you for contacting us.
As requested we have deleted your account from our database.
We wish you all the best and hope to see you again in the future.
Kind regards, Your DAZN team
Privacy Policy: https://my.dazn.com/help/ch-en/privacy Terms of Use: https://my.dazn.com/help/ch-en/terms
